SELECT uc.USER_COIN_ID AS userCoinId, uc.HOLDER_ID AS holderId, uc.HOLD_QUANTITY AS holdQuantity, uc.TOTAL_BUY_AMOUNT AS totalBuyAmount,
c.COIN_ID AS coinId, c.CREATOR_ID AS creatorId,
creator.NAME AS creatorName, creator.IMAGE AS creatorImage, creator.USERNAME AS creatorUsername
FROM USER_COIN uc JOIN COIN c ON uc.COIN_ID = c.COIN_ID JOIN USER creator ON c.CREATOR_ID = creator.USER_ID WHERE uc.HOLDER_ID = #{userId}
